text: I condemn the invasion of my motherland Russia into Ukraine and the attacks of Azerbaijan on my fatherland Armenia.
I am a software engineer and researcher.
I recently joined the Identity team at the DFINITY Foundation, where I focus on scaling Internet Identity, a state-of-the-art trustless authentication service.
Priorly, I was the lead engineer for the Service Nervous System (SNS), a turnkey blockchain framework for launching and operating decentralized autonomous organizations.

I obtained my doctoral degree from Prof.~Peter~M√ºller's Programming Methodology Group at ETH~Zurich. My academic research was focused on developing scalable and precise automated formal reasoning techniques and programmer-friendly tools for formal verification.

Before joining ETH, I was a Research Scientist at Intel's Strategic CAD Lab, developing tools for automatic power & performance debugging in mobile systems. I also worked on compilers, applying machine learning for automatically tuning compiler optimizations, and have designed a novel optimization for an explicitly parallel computer architecture.
